section.name: Unit Testing
section.p: An important part of the software development process is quality assurance. In our case, JUnit, the standard Java testing framework, is being used to build up a comprehensive suite of tests. An added benefit of regression testing is a useful performance benchmark.
"JUnit is a regression testing framework written by Erich Gamma and Kent Beck. It is used by the developer who implements unit tests in Java." More information is available at the JUnit Website.

Long story short, if you have Force Field X code that implements an algorithm you would like us to include in the distribution, you might consider implementing appropriate JUnit tests so we can avoid regressions down the road.
Current JUnit test results are available here.
